      • Timer

        public Timer(java.lang.String id,
             AppKickstarter appKickstarter)
        Constructor for the Timer (an appThread).
        参数:
        id - the name of the timer (should be "Timer")
        appKickstarter - a reference to the AppKickstarter

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method for the thread

      • chkTimeout

        private void chkTimeout()

      • setTimer

        public static int setTimer(java.lang.String id,
                           MBox mbox,
                           long sleepTime)
        Static method for setting a timer based on the wall clock (timer ID is randomly generated for the caller).
        参数:
        id - id of the caller
        mbox - mbox of the caller
        sleepTime - the sleep time (in millisecond)
        返回:
        the timerID

      • setTimer

        public static int setTimer(java.lang.String id,
                           MBox mbox,
                           long sleepTime,
                           int timerID)
        Static method for setting a timer based on the wall clock.
        参数:
        id - id of the caller
        mbox - mbox of the caller
        sleepTime - the sleep time (in millisecond)
        timerID - the timer Id
        返回:
        the timerID

      • setSimulationTimer

        public static int setSimulationTimer(java.lang.String id,
                                     MBox mbox,
                                     long simulationSleepTimeInSeconds)
        Static method for setting a timer based on the simulation time (timer ID is randomly generated for the caller).
        参数:
        id - id of the caller
        mbox - mbox of the caller
        simulationSleepTimeInSeconds - the sleep time (in seconds)
        返回:
        the timerID

      • setSimulationTimer

        public static int setSimulationTimer(java.lang.String id,
                                     MBox mbox,
                                     long simulationSleepTimeInSeconds,
                                     int timerID)
        Static method for setting a timer based on the simulation time.
        参数:
        id - id of the caller
        mbox - mbox of the caller
        simulationSleepTimeInSeconds - the sleep time (in seconds)
        timerID - the timer Id
        返回:
        the timerID

      • getTimesUpMsgTimerId

        public static int getTimesUpMsgTimerId(Msg msg)
        Returns the timerID of the Timeout msg (based on the msg details).
        参数:
        msg - the Timeout msg
        返回:
        the timerID of the Timeout msg

      • getSimulationTime

        public static long getSimulationTime()
        Gets the simulation time
        返回:
        the simulation time

        private void set(Msg msg)

      • cancelTimer

        public static void cancelTimer(java.lang.String id,
                               MBox mbox,
                               int timerID)
        Cancelling a timer.
        参数:
        id - id of the caller
        mbox - mbox of the caller
        timerID - timerID of the timer to be cancelled
